column1: # Добавить сюда своих вопросов. Эту строку надо пропустить при настройке CsvToBean (withSkipLines)

column2: Science doesn't know this yet%true|Certainly. The red UFO is from Mars. And green is from Venus%false|Absolutely not%false

column1: How should resources be loaded form jar in Java?
Which option is a good way to handle the exception?
column2: @SneakyThrow%false|e.printStackTrace()%false|Rethrow with wrapping in business exception (for example, QuestionReadException)%true|Ignoring exception%false

column1: Is it possible to override a static method in Java?
column2: No, static methods are hidden, not overridden%true|Yes, using @Override%false|Only in abstract classes%false

column1: What is the best way to terminate a thread in Java?
column2: Use a volatile boolean flag and cooperative termination%true|Call thread.stop()%false|Send SIGKILL signal from terminal%false

column1: Can a Java interface contain fields?
column2: Yes, but they must be public static final%true|Yes, any kind of field%false|No, fields are not allowed at all%false

column1: Where do exceptions go when no catch block is present?
column2: They propagate up the call stack%true|They are logged to /dev/null%false|They are converted to warnings%false

column1: Can checked exceptions be ignored during compilation?
column2: No, they must be handled or declared%true|Yes, the compiler skips them%false|Only on Tuesdays%false
